Category: Firewall | Baham's Blog <<<<<<< HEAD 2014-05-05T06:11:07+00:00 ======= 2014-05-05T02:41:15+00:00 >>>>>>> a23c99981b95e25d6f8d64b17bbdf4ed403114fc http://baham.co/ Baham Octopress Box webdav http not found error 2013-12-13T13:58:00+00:00 http://baham.co/box-webdav-http-not-found-error

I used box to storage some files and used deja-backup to auto-back and auto-encrypt the files.

And I found these days there are http not found error showed in deja.

So I have about 3 weeks not back my files.

And now I found the solution:

replace www.box.com/dav as dav.box.com/dav

And you can connect the webdav server.

This method maybe not work.
